author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

The original motivation of this PR was that the code of the GsfEleDEtaInSeedCut is a duplicate of code that is already in the GsfElectron class itself:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/74becf9d33ac741b0e4d92b292b1d6cf61619d47/DataFormats/EgammaCandidates/interface/GsfElectron.h#L231

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles and local matrix tests pass.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport intended.
title: Remove GsfEleDEtaInSeedCut and GsfEleDPhiInCut
